import React from 'react'; import PodPayLayout from './PodPayLayout'; import { usePodcastData } from '../hooks/usePodcastData'; import { useEpisodesData } from '../hooks/useEpisodesData'; import { ChevronRight, MoreHorizontal, Calendar, FileText, Play, Eye, Edit, Trash2 } from 'lucide-react'; interface UserInfo { sub: string; email?: string; name?: string; given_name?: string; family_name?: string; } interface PodcastProps { userInfo: UserInfo | null; } export default function Podcast({ userInfo }: PodcastProps) { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = React.useState('episodes'); const { podcasts, currentPodcast, loading, error } = usePodcastData(userInfo); const { episodes: realEpisodes, loading: episodesLoading, error: episodesError } = useEpisodesData(currentPodcast?.id || null); // Mock episodes data - fallback when no real data exists const mockEpisodes = [ { id: "mock-1", title: "Episode 1: Introduction to Our Podcast", status: "published" as const, published_date: "2024-01-15", format: "MP3", pre_rolls: 1, mid_rolls: 2, post_rolls: 1, duration: "45:32" }, { id: "mock-2", title: "Episode 2: Deep Dive into AI Technology", status: "draft" as const, published_date: "2024-01-22", format: "MP3", pre_rolls: 1, mid_rolls: 3, post_rolls: 1, duration: "52:18" }, { id: "mock-3", title: "Episode 3: Future of Content Creation", status: "published" as const, published_date: "2024-01-29", format: "MP3", pre_rolls: 2, mid_rolls: 2, post_rolls: 1, duration: "38:45" } ]; // Use real episodes if available, otherwise use mock data const episodes = realEpisodes?.length > 0 ? realEpisodes : mockEpisodes; const draftsCount = episodes.filter((e: any) => e.status === 'draft').length; const episodesCount = episodes.filter((e: any) => e.status === 'published').length; if (loading) { return (
); } if (error) { return (

{[ { id: 'episodes', label: 'Episodes', count: episodesCount }, { id: 'drafts', label: 'Drafts', count: draftsCount }, { id: 'clips', label: 'Clips', count: 0 }, { id: 'analytics', label: 'Analytics' } ].map((tab) => ( ))}

)} {activeTab === 'drafts' && (
